    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204433</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Spreadsheet formulas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalkulationstabelle Formeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formules de tableur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fórmulas do spreadsheet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formule del foglio elettronico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τύποι υπολογισμών με λογιστικό φύλλο (spreadsheet)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fórmulas de la hoja de balance</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will provide practice using formulas, print options, functions, and adjusting column widths.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion liefert Praxis mit Formeln, 
Druckoptionen, Funktionen und der Justage von von Spaltenbreiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon fournira la pratique en utilisant des
formules, des options d'impression, des fonctions, et ajuster des 
largeurs de colonne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição fornecerá a prática usando 
fórmulas, opções da cópia, funções, e ajuste de larguras de 
coluna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione fornirà la pratica usando le 
formule, le opzioni della stampa, le funzioni e la registrazione delle
larghezze di colonna.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα παράσχει την πρακτική 
χρησιμοποιώντας τους τύπους, τις προαιρετικές δυνατότητες 
τυπωμένων υλών, τις λειτουργίες, και τα πλάτη στηλών ρύθμισης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección proporcionará a práctica usando 
fórmulas, opciones de la impresión, funciones, y el ajuste de 
anchuras de columna.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

    </metadata>
  </description>
